evidence.claim: Medical Brain leverages AWS services for scalable cloud solutions.
The platform supports FHIR API for health data exchange.
Integration with HL7 standards for data interoperability in healthcare.
Medical Brain processes HIPAA-compliant data transactions using X12.
Utilization of AWS EC2 for robust application hosting.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions on their site. Focus on FHIR and HL7 instead.
